mapper.select: SELECT GROUP_CONCAT( sale_attr_value_id ORDER BY sale_attr_value_id SEPARATOR '|' ) AS value_Ids, sku_id FROM sku_sale_attr_value sav WHERE sav.spu_id = #{spuId} GROUP BY sku_id

SELECT sa.id as sa_id,sa.*, sv.id as sv_id,sv.*, IF( sav.sku_id, 1, 0 ) AS isChecked FROM spu_sale_attr sa INNER JOIN spu_sale_attr_value sv ON sa.spu_id = sv.spu_id AND sa.base_sale_attr_id = sv.base_sale_attr_id AND sa.spu_id = #{spuId} LEFT JOIN sku_sale_attr_value sav ON sav.sale_attr_value_id = sv.id AND sav.sku_id = #{skuId} ORDER BY sa.base_sale_attr_id, sv.id
